content:
Hey! It looks like we use priority-based stream ordering (discussed in some detail here) for both stream mentions and the destination stream dropdown in the compose box.

It might be fine for stream mentions, but I was thinking that we're probably being too clever (and therefore confusing) in the destination stream dropdown, and we should just alphabetize the stream names in the dropdown, as we do elsewhere in the app. Thoughts?

Screen-Shot-2022-10-18-at-10.59.38-PM.png

Separately, I'm also wondering what folks think about stream suggestion ordering in the search bar being capitalization-sensitive (ordering matching capitalization first). I'm mostly wondering because other places (e.g., stream mentions) don't seem to be case-sensitive.

Screen-Shot-2022-10-18-at-11.01.37-PM.png Screen-Shot-2022-10-18-at-11.01.30-PM.png

I'm not sure I have a good sense of what's best here. In the context of a user with like 200 streams (which certainly exist; I'm definitely in 100+ in this organization), I think it can at times be meaningful to prioritize streams we think are ones you use often over the others.

One thing to note is that we're I think planning to replace that component with the stream picker we have in "Move messages", and that will potentially change the interaction significantly, so we might want to just revisit this after that migration.
